content: just look at that cute face make the easy to follow quick adorable lil bitty cow next on your crochet list this series of patterns include a minimal sewing design with a different technique for crocheting on the feet/tail only the muzzle ears and horns will need to be sewn on plus facial embroidery as desired win win for those of us that dislike the sewing process perfect for gifts decor and craft tables pattern pack discounts use code 2patterns10 for 10% off 2 patterns 3patterns15 for 15% off 3 patterns 4patterns20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns these discount codes are for individual patterns only and cannot be combined with other offers e-books pattern bundles etc crochet hook 5 0 mm h clover amour crochet hook materials stuffing polyfil 2 - 12mm black safety eyes optional removable stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends scissors black/white embroidery thread yarn super bulky weight yarn 6 - premier parfait chunky note this yarn works up very similarly to a bulky 5 weight yardage main colour - white/black 30 yards each accent colours - toffee rose key lime yellow teddy bear small amount of each pattern can also be made using your favourite 4 worsted weight yarn use above bulky yardage and a g 4 0mm hook abbreviations/stitches chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet flo - front loop only half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet puff st - puff rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet scdec - single_crochet decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s -stitch es *to* - repeat the sequence between the ** the number of times indicated yo - yarn over gauge 4 rounds of gauge pattern = 2 0 inch diameter gauge pattern create a magic_ring round 1 6sc in the ring 6 round 2 2sc in each stitch 12 round 3 *single_crochet 2sc* 6 times 18 round 4 *single_crochet in the next 2 sts 2sc* 6 times 24 measurements/sizes 5 inches minus the ears skill level advanced beginner love this pattern check out more great free and premium patterns on my blog www darlingmapledesigns com let s be friends newsletter sign up -
